TRILUMINOS PRO enhances the reproduction of over a billion accurate colors, resulting in natural and precise picture quality. Google TV with Google Assistant organizes all of your content in one location. Stream from your Apple device using AirPlay 2. With Dolby Vision and Atmos support, you can enjoy immersive cinematic content. With the optional BRAVIA CAM, you can video chat with friends and family and use Gesture Control for continuous control without a remote.

Google TV with Google Assistant

The Sony Bravia KD-55X85K is a 55-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV from Sony. You get access to the Google Play store and a slew of multimedia apps with Google TV, so you can broaden your content horizons. It also enables you to use Google Assistant with your voice. Simply say "OK Google" into the included voice remote to search for movies, TV shows, and music by title or genre, or have Google TV suggest titles for you. It can even control smart home devices that are compatible with it.

Motionflow XR

The Sony Bravia KD-55X85K 55 Inch TV has a 120 Hz refresh rate, which helps keep sports, action movies, and other fast-paced content smooth and blur-free, but Motionflow XR goes even further. Motionflow XR keeps the sharp details in fast-paced scenes by creating extra frames on the fly and weaving them in between the source material. As a result, the experience is smooth, seamless, and realistic.

HDMI 2.1

The Sony Bravia KD-55X85K 55 Inch TV supports HDMI 2.1 connectivity, giving you access to 4K 120 Hz content, eARC, VRR, and ALLM technologies. With eARC, an audio signal is sent back to an optional receiver or soundbar, reducing extra cabling and streamlining your setup. VRR and ALLM are excellent choices for gaming. ALLM can automatically switch your TV settings to a low-latency game mode, while VRR automatically adjusts the refresh rate to match the video source.

Dolby Vision & Atmos

The Sony Bravia KD-55X85K 55 Inch TV has An advanced home theater experience that is possible with Dolby Vision supplying rich and realistic HDR visuals, while Dolby Atmos lets you create an encompassing surround sound experience in your home.

X-Balanced Speakers & Ambient Optimization

Dual distinctively shaped bass reflex speakers are designed to be small enough to fit inside the X85K while still producing 20W of clear and powerful sound. Ambient optimization technology uses light and color sensors to automatically adjust the picture and sound to fit the size of your room.

BRAVIA CAM

The Sony Bravia KD-55X85K 55" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV supports the optional BRAVIA CAM, allowing you to video chat with friends and family while controlling the TV with physical movements via Gesture Control.

Eco-Friendly

The Sony Bravia KD-55X85K 55" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TVs bezel is made using recycled plastic, while multiple advanced technologies are implemented to minimize power consumption.
